name: PaCaPaKa
description:
Let's lead your coins to same coins!
PaCaPaKa is a coin-leading puzzle game.
Tap the screen and switch the paddle, please lead to the goal.

This app has two game modes.

LostCoin mode:
In this mode, you will be over when you fail 3 times.
when you get points again and again, you will recover the lost.

TimeLimit mode:
In this mode, you have a time limit.
when you get points again and again, you will get time bonus.
